title: Dom., internat. factors to relax one-child policy

content.question: Describe two domestic factors that influenced the relaxation of China’s one-child policy. Describe one international factor that influenced the relaxation of the policy.

frqParts.text: Describe two domestic factors that influenced the relaxation of China’s one-child policy. Describe one international factor that influenced the relaxation of the policy.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
